text: The standing long jump event at the 1922 Women's World Games took place in Paris at the Stade Pershing on 20 August 1922. The qualification took place during the morning session with the final taking place during the afternoon session. American Camille Sabie won the event with a distance of 2.485 metre, ahead of the British and French . ==Results== ===Qualification=== The qualification took place during the morning session. The best four athletes qualified for the final. Rank Name Nationality Distance Notes ? Q ? Camille Sabie Q ? Q ?
